channel.title: Can somebody assist me here?
channel.description:
My server isn't working - no matter how many times I try it simply won't work. The error I get is "Error connecting to server", now I've changed the 'server=' in client.java and it still won't work.
If somebody could post here, or perhaps help me on Skype? Add codythepr0 if so.

item.title: Can somebody assist me here?

lmao he had utorrent up

Read full topic

item.title: Can somebody assist me here?
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

YOUR SERVER SAYS ERROR CONNECTING TO SERVER NO MATTER HOW MANY TIMES YOU TRY NOTING HAPPENS OKAY I WILL HELP YOU WHY DID YOU GO INTO YOUR SOURCE TO FIX A CLIENT-SIDED ERROR YOU DO NOT USE YOUR SOURCE TO CONNECT GO INTO YOUR CLIENT AND CHANGE THE IP THERE ALSO THIS IS THE SERVER HELP BOARD SO YOU SHOULD POST THIS IN THE CLIENT HELP BOARD OKAY CODY

Don’t you see how hard it is to clearly understand someone who is typing in all capitalization and blatantly disregarding basic English punctuation? If you’re going to ask for help and you expect someone to actually consider helping you, you need to make your thread easily understood as a lot of people aren’t even native to the English language.

Read full topic
